summary: A Kentucky widower bound for 1820's Texas with his young son is thwarted in his efforts by a corrupt constable, a long-standing family feud, and a beautiful indentured servant.
cast: Burt Lancaster|Dianne Foster|Diana Lynn|Walter Matthau|Donald MacDonald|John McIntire|Una Merkel|John Carradine|John Litel|Rhys Williams|Edward Norris|Clem Bevans|Blackie|Lee Erickson|Faro|Lisa Ferraday|James Griffith|Gil Herman|Mitchell Kowall|Norman Leavitt|Milicent Patrick|James Seay|Douglas Spencer|Glenn Strange|Paul Wexler|Whip Wilson|Will Wright
title: El hombre de Kentucky
